mapper.select: select mh.*,(select picture from medical_hospital_picture where hospital_id = mh.id order by version limit 0,1 ) as versionPictures from medical_hospital mh where mh.deleted =0 and mh.status = 1 and mh.id = ( select hospital_id from medical_hospital_doctor where doctor_id = (select doctor_id from medical_doctor_account where account_id =#{userId} ) and deleted = 0 )
select mh.* from medical_hospital mh inner join medical_hospital_account mha on mh.id = mha.doctor_id where mh.deleted =0 and mh.status = 1 and mha.account_id = #{userId}
